export PATH="/opt/homebrew/bin:$PATH" export RESTIC_PASSWORD_FILE="$HOME/.openclaw/restic-password" REPO="$HOME/openclaw-backups" LOG="$HOME/.openclaw/logs/workspace-backup.log"
restic -r "$REPO" backup "$HOME/.openclaw" \ --exclude browser \ --exclude skill-venv \ --exclude logs \ --tag automated --quiet 2>&1 | tee -a "$LOG"
restic -r "$REPO" forget \ --keep-daily 7 --keep-weekly 4 --keep-monthly 6 \ --prune --quiet 2>&1 | tee -a "$LOG"
